description: This file defines express route handlers for the testing system API, including endpoints for managing test suites, retrieving results, logs, reports, and webhooks. It includes Swagger documentation annotations for API documentation.

methods.name: listSuites
methods.description: Handles listing all test suites with optional pagination.

methods.name: createSuite
methods.description: Handles creating a new test suite.

methods.name: getSuite
methods.description: Retrieves details of a specific test suite by ID.

methods.name: updateSuite
methods.description: Updates an existing test suite by ID.

methods.name: deleteSuite
methods.description: Deletes a test suite by ID.

methods.name: executeSuite
methods.description: Triggers execution of a specific test suite.

methods.name: listResults
methods.description: Retrieves a list of test execution results with optional filters.

methods.name: getLogs
methods.description: Retrieves logs for a specific test execution.

methods.name: getReport
methods.description: Retrieves a test report by ID.

methods.name: registerWebhook
methods.description: Registers a webhook endpoint for notifications.
